self_care: Hydration, rest, bland foods when tolerated
warning_signs: Blood in stool, severe dehydration, persistent vomiting, high fever

self_care: Drink fluids, rest, consider medical evaluation
warning_signs: Back/flank pain, fever/chills, blood in urine, worsening pain

self_care: Avoid spicy/acidic foods, smaller meals, hydration
warning_signs: Severe abdominal pain, black/tarry stools, vomiting blood

self_care: Rest, hydration, consider urgent evaluation if breathing symptoms
warning_signs: Trouble breathing, chest pain, confusion, low oxygen

self_care: Rest, fluids, isolate if contagious risk
warning_signs: Shortness of breath, chest pain, confusion, worsening symptoms
Breathing difficulty, dehydration, symptoms worsening after improvement
